subject: New file uploaded to EVP-ITC
author: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
full_text:
Hello,

This email message is a notification to let you know that
a file has been uploaded to the Files area of the EVP-ITC 
group.

  File        : /Adriana's Files/0800utoobitch.mp3 
  Uploaded by : adrianamjones <adrianamjones@...> 
  Description : Me: thanks for talking to me /  voice: you're welcome spirit... spirit in half of them /  Me: hope you're all doing well / voice: you too bitch /  Me: Did I hear bitch or its just my imagination? /   Voices: geez no, weird, uh-uh, I'm sure it's no one / Me: no and laughed...... (Denying little bastards!!! Lololol!!!!!)  (RB # 14) 

You can access this file at the URL:
http://groups.yahoo.com/group/EVP-ITC/files/Adriana%27s%20Files/0800utoobitch.mp3 

To learn more about file sharing for your group, please visit:

Regards,

adrianamjones <adrianamjones@...>
